description:
Usagi and her friends start their new lives as high school girls. Meanwhile, Nehelenia breaks out of her mirror prison to seek revenge against the Sailor Guardians.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Akumu Hana o Chirasu Toki! Yami no Joou Fukkatsu
Guerreros Estelares. ¡Cuando las pesadilla expande las flores!
The Flower of Nightmares Scatters: The Queen of Darkness Returns
悪夢花を散らす時! 闇の女王復活
